description: Wycombe give their League One automatic promotion hopes a boost with victory at play-off hopefuls Huddersfield.
title: Huddersfield Town 0-1 Wycombe Wanderers
title_page: Huddersfield Town 0-1 Wycombe Wanderers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Huddersfield Town have lost just one of their last 11 league games against Wycombe Wanderers (W7 D3), though that sole defeat did come in this exact fixture the last time it was played at the John Smith’s Stadium in February 2021 (2-3).
Wycombe Wanderers have lost just two of their last 10 away league games against sides from Yorkshire (W5 D3), scoring 2+ goals in seven of those matches.
Huddersfield have only won two of their last 10 home league games played on a Tuesday (D1 L7), failing to score in six of these matches.
Wycombe have only lost one of their last 18 midweek (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday) away league games (W12 D5), although that was this season’s reverse fixture at Huddersfield in January (0-1).
